text: Eleanor Grace Harvey (born January 14, 1995) is a Canadian foil fencer. She competed in the individual foil, team foil, and team sabre events. Harvey was going to become an athlete in karate before becoming a fencer. Before becoming an Olympian, Harvey competed at the Pan American Games. She has won medals at the 2015, 2019, and 2023 games. She won gold medal in 2015, a silver and two bronze in 2019, and two silvers in 2023. Harvey is a three-time Olympian. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics where she finish in 7th place and at the 2020 Summer Olympics finishing in 16th place. Harvey competed for Canada in the individual foil event at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, France and won the bronze medal. It was the first time that a Canadian had won a medal in the sport of fencing. ==References== ==Other websites== *International Fencing Federation profile *Canadian Olympic team profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Canadian sportspeople Category:Fencers Category:Sportspeople from Hamilton, Ontario
title: Eleanor Harvey
